short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Snake game for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Relive the nostalgia of the classic Snake game with an old-school look and experience! This game keeps it simple, pixelated, and endlessly addictive. Guide your snake to gobble up food, grow longer, and avoid colliding with yourself.

With a minimalistic design, retro controls, and classic gameplay, it’s a throwback to simpler times. No flashy graphics or distractions—just pure, classic Snake fun! Adjust the game speed for a more relaxed or intense challenge, and aim to beat your high score, just like the good old days.
